thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 05 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Accelerate Property Fund Drops Plans To Buy A Polish Industrial Portfolio

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Accelerate Property Fund Drops Plans To Buy A Polish Industrial Portfolio
text:
Feb 5 (Reuters) - Accelerate Property Fund Ltd:
* ‍UPDATE ON FOURWAYS MALL REDEVELOPMENT AND PROPOSED ACQUISITION​
* ‍CONSTRUCTION WORK ON REDEVELOPMENT AND EXPANSION OF FOURWAYS MALL CONTINUES TO PROCEED ACCORDING TO SCHEDULE​
* ACCELERATE PROPERTY FUND- ‍SHAREHOLDERS ARE ADVISED COMPANY WILL NO LONGER BE PURSUING PROPOSED ACQUISITION OF A POLISH LIGHT INDUSTRIAL AND LOGISTICS PORTFOLIO MENTIONED ON NOV 20​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
